subject: RE: [junit] Re: Individual tests ok, problem in a suite
msgSnippet: ... The other lesson is:  if you think you found a bug in HashMap, you are most likely wrong :-) (which is a variant of the older saying:  the bug is always in
messageBody:
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On

> The lesson here is to restrict variable declarations to the
> smallest scope that you can get away with.

The other lesson is: if you think you found a bug in HashMap, you are most
likely wrong :-)

(which is a variant of the older saying: the bug is always in your code,
never in the compiler)
